name: Come to Light
description:
Have you seen rock bottom? A poetic game that takes you there.

I believe a good way of thinking is imagine that we all have a water well within our souls ... a dark water well, full of obstacles. Our dreams, our hopes are like delicate light spheres try to touch our hearts. Wise is the one who discovers that crusade his home is simply within his own soul. If you are happy, if you can relax and feel welcomed. Congratulations and... Welcome home!
